name: preparr
description: A Docker sidecar that fully automates Servarr initialization - from deployment to ready-to-use instances with zero manual setup

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --target bun --outdir dist && bun build src/qbittorrent-init.ts --target bun --outdir dist
scripts.docker:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.full.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.full.yml down -v
scripts.test:docker: bun run docker:clean && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build

author: Robbe Verhelst
